tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: The Avengers Movie CLIP - Captain America Deleted Scene (2012) - Marvel Movie
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Subscribe to TRAILERS: bit.ly Subscribe to COMING SOON: bit.ly The Avengers Movie CLIP - Captain America Deleted Scene (2012) - Marvel Movie Nick Fury and the international agency SHIELD bring together a team of super humans to form The Avengers to help save the Earth from Loki & his various membered army. movieclips movie clips movieclips.com movieclipsDOTcom movieclipstrailers "Avengers movie" "Avengers superhero" "Robert Downey Jr." "Mark Ruffalo" "Scarlett Johansson" "chris hemsworth" "clark gregg" "Jeremy Renner" Hulk "Iron Man" "Captain America" Thor "Black Widow" Hawkeye "Joss Whedon" tv spot television imax commercial hulk scene clip dcoscarelli "stan lee" "fantastic four"

tva:Genre.tva:Name: FICTION/DRAMA
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Programme consisting of a prose or verse composition, resp. one telling a story, written for or as if for performance by actors, puppets or animated

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Should've kept this in, really, it would've added to the﻿ part where she was talking about being saved by captain america like the bet Nick Fury and Captain America make.
i cant remember i was mocking the fag punches more than anything if﻿ im honest. good film though
Fuck german pigs! ﻿
You can suck my german﻿ balls.
Commies man﻿ the fucking commies...

The Soviets only fought on one front of one﻿ theater of war, and only began to win after the US joined, supplied everyone, and opened the western front which relieved pressure from the eastern front.
The Soviets did inflict the most casualties and suffered the most casualties, but in the full-spectrum of the war they didn't do the most, the US did. The US was the only country to fight two simultaneous regional wars, the US fought in Europe while fighting Japan nearly single-handedly.
So he meets that waitress earlier in﻿ the movie.

what is with this stupid﻿ craze where you take someones name you idolize and then put 'mother fucking' in it? I'm pretty sure it started with 'bill FUCKING murrary', and to be honest, that's where it should have stopped.

I love when brainwashed people ironically call informed people brainwashed.
Every thing I﻿ said is historical fact.
whose this murray guy bills fucking ae?﻿
Nice clip, would've been nice to see﻿ it in the movie.
your a dumb﻿ army.
Stan Lee is in the end of the movie﻿ anyways
Except﻿ that Mexico is actually in North America.
I used samuel motherfucking﻿ jackson back in high school, dunno if that counts it was before zombieland
This would've made the movie a little better actually. More quiet moments before all﻿ the BANG BOOM PLOWY.

You do realise Europe is a continent right?
England, Germany, France﻿ are all part of Europe, much like Mexico, Peru and Brazil are parts of South America.
STAN LEE IS STILL IN THE FUCKING﻿ MOVIE.
He is still﻿ in the movie.
I﻿ can see why it didn't make the final edit but it is a good scene.

as an American I have to say that this guy does not speak for all of us. those of us that know history, know that America would have had nowhere to﻿ attack from if the Brits did not hold out and also could not have taken the ground armies of Hitlers panzer division if the Russians had not pounded the shit out of the Nazis from the east. It's stuff like this that makes me weep for our uneducated populous.
This﻿ could be a new intro to the new captain america movie
Can it maple leaf, hats don't﻿ talk. and our mexico doesn't even look like shoes. they are our gay beard:)

It's funny because you're uneducated. The US supplied all of the allies with the MAJORITY of all allied war material, was the only country to fight in every theater of war, the only country to fight two simultaneous regional campaigns etc...
The US fought Japan with almost no help while simultaneously doing most of the work in Africa, the Med, Italy, and then western Europe. And again, this whole time the US was﻿ also supplying all of the allies, including the Soviets.
OMG. Bill fucked Murray? When?... I can't believe Bill cheated on his wife with Murray..... This day is now so sad.... :(﻿
